info.title: Vehicle Transport Automation
info.description: Control Panel for Email-to-ClickUp Pipeline with ML Training Support

get.description:
Health check endpoint.

Returns system health status including:
- Database connectivity
- Required directories
- Configuration status
Simple readiness probe for k8s/docker.
Simple liveness probe for k8s/docker.

Get a summary of configuration status.

Shows which integrations are configured without exposing secrets.
Get all settings (secrets masked).

put.description: Update which export targets are enabled.

get.description: Get all configured warehouses.

schema.title: Response Get Warehouses Api Settings Warehouses Get

post.description:
Test Google Sheets connection.

Attempts to connect to the configured spreadsheet and
verify read/write access.

Upload a PDF and extract data.

Returns extraction preview with confidence scores and warnings.
Does not save to any export target - use dry-run for that.

Preview the Central Dispatch listing payload.

Shows exactly what would be sent to CD API without actually creating the listing.

Preview the Google Sheets row that would be written.

Shows the exact data that would appear in the spreadsheet.

Perform a complete dry run of the pipeline.

Shows what would happen if this PDF was processed, including:
- Extraction results
- CD payload (if enabled)
- Sheets row (if enabled)
- Warehouse routing (if enabled)

Does NOT actually create anything - purely for preview.

Classify a PDF to determine the auction source.

Returns classification scores from all extractors.

get.description:
List runs with optional filtering.

Returns paginated list of processing runs.

parameters.name: source_type

schema.description: Filter by source: email, upload, batch
schema.title: Source Type

parameters.description: Filter by source: email, upload, batch

parameters.name: status

schema.description: Filter by status: pending, processing, ok, failed, error
schema.title: Status

parameters.description: Filter by status: pending, processing, ok, failed, error

parameters.name: auction

schema.description: Filter by auction: COPART, IAA, MANHEIM
schema.title: Auction

parameters.description: Filter by auction: COPART, IAA, MANHEIM

get.description:
Get run statistics.

Returns aggregate counts by status, auction, and source.
Get a single run by ID.

delete.description: Delete a run and its logs.

get.description: Get logs for a specific run.

schema.title: Response Get Run Logs Api Runs  Run Id  Logs Get

get.description: Search logs across all runs.

parameters.name: level

schema.description: Filter by level: INFO, WARNING, ERROR
schema.title: Level

parameters.description: Filter by level: INFO, WARNING, ERROR

post.description:
Retry a failed run.

Creates a new run with the same parameters.

get.description: Export runs to CSV format.

List all auction types.

Returns base types (Copart, IAA, Manheim, Other) and custom types.

post.description:
Create a new auction type.

Custom types should have parent_id pointing to "Other" (id=4).
Base types cannot be created via API.

get.description: Get a single auction type by ID.

put.description:
Update an auction type.

Note: Base types have limited updateable fields.

delete.description:
Delete (deactivate) an auction type.

Base types cannot be deleted.

get.description: Get a single auction type by code.

post.description:
Upload a document for extraction and training.

The document is associated with an auction type and marked as train or test.
Duplicate detection is performed using SHA256 hash.

get.description: List documents with optional filtering.

parameters.name: dataset_split

schema.description: Filter by split: train or test
schema.title: Dataset Split

parameters.description: Filter by split: train or test

get.description: Get a single document by ID.
Get the raw extracted text from a document.
Get document counts by auction type.

schema.title: Response Get Document Stats Api Documents Stats By Auction Type Get

post.description:
Run extraction on a document.

Creates an extraction run and executes the extraction.
By default runs synchronously. Set sync=false for background execution.

get.description: List extraction runs with optional filtering.
List extraction runs that need review.
Get detailed extraction run with field-level outputs.

Get all review items for an extraction run.

Returns the extraction run info and all review items to be reviewed.

put.description:
Update a single review item.

Mark as correct (is_match_ok=true) or provide a corrected value.

post.description:
Submit review corrections for an extraction run.

This endpoint:
1. Updates all review items with corrections
2. Creates TrainingExamples from the corrected data
3. Optionally marks the run as reviewed

TrainingExamples are used for future ML model training.

Mark an extraction run as reviewed/approved.

Use this after all items have been reviewed.

get.description:
List training examples for ML training.

Filter by auction type, field, or correctness.

Export training examples for ML training.

Returns JSONL or CSV format suitable for fine-tuning.

post.description:
Export extraction runs to Central Dispatch API V2.

Set dry_run=true to preview payloads without sending.
Set sandbox=true to use CD sandbox environment.

get.description:
Preview the CD API V2 payload for a single run.

Useful for debugging before export.
List export jobs with optional filtering.
Get details of an export job.
List model versions with optional filtering.
Get the active model version for an auction type.

post.description:
Promote a model version to active status.

This deactivates any other active model for the same auction type.

Start a new training job.

This will train a PEFT/LoRA adapter for the specified auction type
using the collected training examples.

get.description: List training jobs with optional filtering.
Get details of a training job.

Get training data statistics per auction type.

Shows which auction types have enough data for training.

schema.title: Response Get Training Stats Api Models Training Stats Get
